headline: GTA Online
subtitle: HOW TO GET STARTED
content:
Answer the phone call from Charlie Reed to take on freelance mercenary work with the Los Santos Angels. You’ll need a Mammoth Avenger to launch the new series of missions from your Avenger Operations Terminal. If you don’t already own an Avenger, you can pick one up from Warstock Cache & Carry.

For new business opportunities, visit the Free Trade Shipping Co. terminal in your Hangar, or purchase a Hangar from Maze Bank Foreclosures for access to the criminal smuggling business.
